features: 【Memory Foam Seat Cushion】 Breathable, soft and firm sitting pad. Our cushion cores are made of high quality memory foam with slow rebound properties. The cushion cover is made of breathable football mesh material. The memory foam seat fits snugly around your bum, providing even butt support. Pressure relief seat cuhions.

【Sciatica Pillow Function】 This coccyx seat cushion can effectively relieve numbness and pain from low back pain, sciatica, herniated disc, coccyx injury, back pain from pregnancy, hip pain, hemorrhoids and pressure sores. At the same time, our office chair cushion can also correct your sitting posture.

【Hip Support Pillow Feature】 The hollow design and the mesh cushion cover have greatly improved the breathability of this sitting pad, and it will not be stuffy after long-time use. Pure memory foam cushion, no smell. Non-slip bottom design. Easy to clean, the zipper design removes the cushion cover for washing.( Note: The pillow core cannot be washed, and it should also be kept out of direct sunlight. )

【Wide Use Seat Pillow】 Our cushion is suitable for many kinds of people and many scenes. It can be donut pillow, desk chair cushion, office chair seat cushion, gaming chair cushion, wheelchair seat pad, car lifting seat cushion, travel cushion, tailbone pillow, hemorrhoid cushion, coccyx seat cushion, sciatica cushion, buffer cushion, meditation cushion and so on.

【Best Gift and Good Service】 This chair pad is also one of the best gifts for family and friends. Especially for sedentary work, pregnant women, the elderly, the disabled and other people. Regarding our service, we have a professional customer service team. If you have any questions about our products, please contact us through Amazon, we will reply you within 24 hours and deal with your questions, allowing you to shop worry-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality, Effective and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I received this cushion about 30 days ago and wanted to test it out for a bit before reviewing it, and while it hasn't completely transformed my life, it has made a noticeable difference in my daily comfort. Here's my take:I've been dealing with occasional lower back pain and spasms, and this cushion does offer a degree of relief. It's not a miracle worker but I didn't expect it to be. The ergonomic design and memory foam provide a comfortable seating experience, especially during long hours at the desk.Relieving coccyx discomfort intrigued me since I'm pretty sore after multiple hours at the desk, and I can say that the cushion does contribute to reducing discomfort in this area It's not a total solution, but the added support does make a noticeable difference.One of the features I appreciate is the non-slip bottom. It stays securely in place on my office chair, and I don't find myself constantly readjusting it. This feature adds to the overall convenience of use.So far, the cushion has held up well. The build quality seems durable, and I haven't noticed any significant wear and tear despite daily use.Overall, I like this cushion and will continue to use it. While it may not be a perfect fit for everyone, it's a practical solution for those seeking moderate support during extended periods of sitting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very small pillow. But comfy.
reviews.reviewText: I don't know why I expected the pillow to be larger. I was a bit surprised at the size but when you are sitting in the coffee shop on a hard wooden chair, writing reviews, it does help to soften it a bit. Not sure if it actually helps with the pain or of my pain is being just more stubborn than normal. so that is up to you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great cushion that really forms to your butt. I really like it and don't feel like I'm being thrown out of my chair like so many others. It makes sitting in your office chair way better! I would definitely recommend this one over the other cushions that have barely any form to them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Support, Better Posture....
reviews.reviewText: I have had lower back issues for several years. Not bad enough to really want to "do something" about it, but a nuisance nonetheless. I have known, especially through work from home the last few years that I need to improve my posture at my desk; it just comes down to doing something about it. This pillow is an attempt in that direction.Thoughts:~The pillow is firm. This is good for posture, but it does take some getting used to. Candidly, it is tougher to slouch. Do I like that? I should.... but...~I definitely sit up and type better when sitting on the pillow.~When I first sit down, my rear does not match exactly to the contours of the pillow. I guess that is to be expected, but it wears in over a few minutes. I do think the gap in the middle helps with this.~I don't really have any dislikes, other than I know I need to use this, but it is not what I am "used to". I am used to slouching, and that is not good for me.Overall - I recommend this product if you are committed to helping back posture when sitting on the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I literally had to get up out of my desk chair to take photos of this cushion because I literally use this everyday in my office chair! This MOSCPA Seat Cushion Office Chair Cushions has awesome Memory Foam! It features a Non-Slip Butt Pillow to comfort the Tailbone, Coccyx, and Sciatica. This pillow aids in Lower Back Pain Relief! It has a Breathable Lifting seat Pad for Car, any Seat, Wheelchair, or Wooden Stool. I have the one in black and the under side is white which shows the breathable area and the memory foam cushion! This seat provides support and relief! It’s the perfect size for any desk chair or seat! The cushion performs well and is made of exceptional quality materials! It’s perfect for at home, ℹ your car on the go or travel on a train or airplane! I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Makes you focus on posture
reviews.reviewText: As other reviewers have noted, it makes you focus on your posture. If I'm slouching while I'm sitting on it, I'll get uncomfortable. Once I straighten up, it is much better.I like the thickness of this cushion. I had gotten a "bamboo" cushion and that went flat very quickly (I think my cat liked it more than I did.) This I can sit on and it gives me some cushion and support. It does take a little fiddling to decide which way is more comfortable, bit hole toward the back or front. I have the big hole toward the back, that works for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You won't be disappointed
reviews.reviewText: If you're not yet using a memory cushioned foam and you're always sitting in front of a computer, you're missing out! I've tried various cushioned foam and I have them in all my office chairs, whether at home or in the office. This particular seat cushion may take time for you to get used to as its shaped differently with a hole in the middle, but that in general will force you to sit in proper posture. It definitely alleviates a lot of my back and hip pain. It took me a month before leaving a review as I wanted to see how it is after a month of use, still good as new. The foam is firm and sturdy and the cover can be easily removed and pop in the washer. A little bit on the expensive side, but totally a game changer and highly recommended.
